slides.caption: Rest and relaxation is ensured with luxurious robes and Rivolta Italian bed linens, plush Sealy mattresses and 100% organic bath amenities by Juice Beauty.
Rest and relaxation is ensured with luxurious robes and Rivolta Italian bed linens, plush Sealy mattresses and 100% organic bath amenities by Juice Beauty.

rooms.name: Superior Rooms
rooms.description: Immerse yourself in the design details of our Superior Rooms. Floor-to-ceiling windows let in the natural light so you can comfortably work; blackout curtains and plush mattresses create the perfect environment for you to rest and reset.

types.name: Superior King
description: After a relaxing day of lounging by the pool, retreat to your comfortably appointed Superior King room and grab a complimentary cold bottle of water from your mini fridge. Drift off as you ponder the California-inspired naturescapes featured on your accent wall.
details: Southeastern view or view of Ameswell lawn

types.name: Superior Two Queens
description: Grab a friend and explore all that the Ameswell has to offer – from fabulous food adventures to outdoor adventures. Wrap up the day in soft cotton robes sharing stories and laughs from your own comfy Queen beds.
details: Southeastern view or views of Ameswell lawn
Option of adjoining to Premium King, based on availability

rooms.name: Deluxe Rooms
rooms.description: Deluxe Rooms offer a place to kick back and relax or kick up the work pace. Lounge on the chaise or let your next great idea take flight at a desk inspired by the wing of an airplane.

types.name: Deluxe King
description: Complimentary ultra-highspeed internet lets you work or catch up on emails quickly so you can stash your laptop in your safe and head over to Roger for a well-deserved cocktail and dinner. End the evening with a peaceful sleep on a plush Sealy mattress outfitted with luxurious Italian linens.
details: Views of Ameswell lawn, NASA Ames or Southeastern view
Available as Mobile-Impaired King Accessible Room

types.name: Deluxe Two Queens
description: Be alone together when you share one of our Deluxe Rooms with Two Queen beds. Enjoy plenty of space to stretch out in your own bed and binge your favorite Netflix series together on a 65” Samsung Smart TV.
details: View of NASA Ames or Southeastern view
Option of adjoining to Premium King, based on availability

rooms.name: Wellness Rooms
rooms.description: Maintain your routine or start a new one in our signature Ameswell Wellness King Rooms. Choose from over 4,000 classes on Lululemon’s Mirror fitness app, maximize your workout with accessories from Fitnesse, and fuel your day with Jerry Rice’s all-natural energy drink, G.0.A.T. Fuel.

types.name: Wellness King
description: Show yourself some self-love in a signature Ameswell King Wellness Room. Everything you need to stay fit is right at your fingertips, from the Mirror fitness app to easy access to the pool, spa treatment rooms and 1,600 square foot fitness center.
details: Adjustable weights, resistance bands and training mat
Jerry Rice’s all-natural energy drink, G.O.A.T. Fuel
Easy access to pool, spa and fitness center

rooms.name: Premium Rooms
rooms.description: Spread out in our spacious Premium Rooms with room to move and views that soothe. These bright, airy rooms offer an abundance of natural light, while filtering out noise so you can fully recharge.

types.name: Premium King
description: Leave the world behind and soak up the views, not the noise, in a Premium King guest room. Close the blackout drapes at the end of the day and rest easy knowing that the air at Ameswell is filtered to medical-grade levels and guest rooms never share air.
details: View of NASA Ames, Ameswell lawn or Southeastern view
Available as Mobile-Impaired King Accessible Room
Option of adjoining to Two Queen room, based on availability

types.name: Premium Two Queens
description: Bring the whole crew to explore the abundance of activities nearby and on-site at Ameswell. After a fun day of exploring, spread out in a Premium Room with two Queen beds for a movie night on your 65” Samsung Smart TV.
details: View of NASA Ames or Ameswell lawn
Available as Mobile-Impaired King Accessible Room
Option of adjoining to Premium King, based on availability

rooms.name: Accessible Rooms
rooms.description: The Ameswell Hotel was designed to be a welcoming place for all our guests. Easily select from one of our many accessible guest rooms to find the one that best suits your needs.

types.name: King Accessible w/Roll in Shower
description: Our Accessible King Rooms are 440 square feet and feature a plush Sealy King bed with Rivolta Italian linens, an abundance of USB and USB-C charging ports, and 100% Organic bath amenities by Juice Beauty.

The entrance doorways to the guest room and bathroom provide at least 35″ of clear width. There is at least 30″ of clearance on each side of the bed. The desk provides knee and toe clearance that is at least 28″ high, 36″ wide and 20″ deep. All wall-mounted accessories and equipment are within 46″ of the floor.

This room features a wheelchair accessible shower with foldable seat and detachable handheld showerhead. The toilet seat is 18″ above the floor and has grab bars on the adjacent wall. The sink provides knee clearance of at least 29″ high and 31″ wide and all the under-sink plumbing is wrapped.

types.name: Two Queens Accessible
description: Our Accessible Two Queen rooms offer an extra bed for a guest or caregiver. At a spacious 475 square feet, these rooms feature two plush Sealy Queen mattresses with Rivolta Italian bed linens, an abundance of USB and USB-C charging ports, and 100% Organic bath amenities by Juice Beauty.

The entrance doorways to the guest room and bathroom provide at least 35″ of clear width. There is at least 30″ of clearance on each side of the beds. The desk provides knee and toe clearance that is at least 28″ high, 36″ wide and 20″ deep. All wall-mounted accessories and equipment are within 46″ of the floor.

This room features a bathtub with safety grab bars mounted on the wall. The toilet seat is 18″ above the floor and has grab bars on the adjacent wall. The sink provides knee clearance of at least 29″ high and 31″ wide and all the under-sink plumbing is wrapped.

types.name: Two Queens Accessible w/Roll in Shower
description: Our Accessible Two Queen rooms offer an extra bed for a guest or caregiver. At a spacious 475 square feet, these rooms feature two plush Sealy Queen mattresses with Rivolta Italian bed linens, an abundance of USB and USB-C charging ports, and 100% Organic bath amenities by Juice Beauty.

The entrance doorways to the guest room and bathroom provide at least 35″ of clear width. There is at least 30″ of clearance on each side of the beds. The desk provides knee and toe clearance that is at least 28″ high, 36″ wide and 20″ deep. All wall-mounted accessories and equipment are within 46″ of the floor.

This room features a wheelchair accessible shower with foldable seat and detachable handheld showerhead. The toilet seat is 18″ above the floor and has grab bars on the adjacent wall. The sink provides knee clearance of at least 29″ high and 31″ wide and all the under-sink plumbing is wrapped.

types.name: Superior King Hearing-Impaired Accessible
description: Featuring visual doorbells, these comfortably appointed rooms are designed to make our hearing-impaired guests as comfortable as possible. Curl up in a robe or luxurious Italian bed linens to fully rest and reset.
details: Views of Ameswell lawn or Moffett Boulevard

types.name: Superior Two Queens Hearing-Impaired Accessible
description: You and your guest can rest easy with the addition of a visual doorbell in the Superior Two Queens Hearing-Impaired Accessible room. An abundance of charging ports and ultra-highspeed internet service keeps you connected; plush mattresses and exquisite linens help you rest.
details: Views of Ameswell lawn or Moffett Boulevard

types.name: Deluxe King Hearing-Impaired Accessible
description: Our Deluxe King rooms feature a plush Sealy King mattress with Rivolta Italian bed linens, organic bath amenities, soft Ameswell robes, and a visual doorbell for our hearing-impaired guests.

types.name: Premium King Hearing-Impaired Accessible
description: Our Spacious Premium King guestrooms provide an abundance of USB and USB-C charging ports and a visual doorbell for our hearing-impaired guests. Floor-to-ceiling windows let in the natural light, while blackout curtains help provide a restful sleep.

types.name: Junior Suite Mobility-Impaired Accessible
description: Starting at 525 square feet, Junior Suites feature an en suite sitting area with multiple floor-to-ceiling windows for entertaining guests and a King bed with exquisite Italian linens when you are ready to call it a day.

The entrance doorways to the guest room and bathroom provide at least 35″ of clear width. There is at least 30″ of clearance on each side of the bed. The desk provides knee and toe clearance that is at least 28″ high, 36″ wide and 20″ deep. All wall-mounted accessories and equipment are within 46″ of the floor.

This room features a wheelchair accessible shower with foldable seat and detachable handheld showerhead. The toilet seat is 18″ above the floor and has grab bars on the adjacent wall. The sink provides knee clearance of at least 29″ high and 31″ wide and all the under-sink plumbing is wrapped.

types.name: Premium Two Queen Hearing-Impaired Accessible
description: Our Spacious Premium Two Queen beds guestrooms provide two plush Sealy Queen mattresses with luxurious Italian bed linens and a visual doorbell. Floor-to-ceiling windows let in the natural light, while blackout curtains help provide a restful sleep.
details: Views of NASA Ames or Ameswell lawn

rooms.name: Suites
rooms.description: Experience the Suite Life with plenty of room to entertain or just to enjoy some extra quiet space for yourself. Go ahead. You deserve it.

types.name: Junior Suite
description: Starting at 525 square feet, Junior Suites feature an en suite sitting area with multiple floor-to-ceiling windows for entertaining guests and a King bed with exquisite Italian linens when you are ready to call it a day.
details: Views of Pool or Event Lawn

types.name: Executive Suite
description: Good sleep is sacred, and this is your chance to indulge. Book an Executive Suite and keep work and entertaining in your spacious living area with a half bath, then leave the world behind with a relaxing soak in your tub and deep sleep in a separate, quiet King bedroom.

types.name: Corner One-Bedroom Suite
description: Enjoy views for days in one of our Corner One-Bedroom Suites. At 790 square feet, these suites offer a private King bedroom and separate living space featuring pull-out sofas and powder rooms.
details: Separate living room with pullout sofa

types.name: Arbor Suite
description: Immerse yourself in luxury. With wraparound windows in the living space, every detail of this suite is designed for a truly modern luxury experience. Sink into the blue velvet couch, soak in the tub or soak in the views. This is life at its best.
details: Wrap around windows with views of Ameswell lawnn
Separate living room with pullout sofa

types.name: Ameswell Suite
description: Three is never a crowd in the Ameswell Suite. At 955 square feet, this is our most spacious guest room. With a private King bedroom, pull-out sofa, there is plenty of room for family or friends to join in the fun.
details: Separate living room with pullout sofa
Adjoining Deluxe King room on request, based on availability

features.title: High-speed wifi & Workstation
features.text: Blazing fast internet. How fast? We will tell you sometime soon!

features.title: 100% Organic Bath Amenities
features.text: Juice Beauty and The Ameswell Hotel have collaborated to bring guests a truly Farm-to-Beauty experience. On its Sonoma County organic farm, Juice Beauty grows the antioxidant rich ingredients that go into all of our bath amenities. Plus, our dispensing program eliminates an estimated 350,000 plastic bottles per year, furthering our joint commitment to sustainability

features.title: Rest
features.text: Our blackout curtains and high-grade STC rating (Sound Transmission Classification) create a quiet, calming environment in every guest room Curl up in 100% cotton Rivolta Italian linens atop plush Sealy mattresses for a luxurious sleep experience. And rest easy knowing that our medical-grade air filtration system ensures you never share air with another guest room.

features.title: Refresh
features.text: Enjoy an entirely organic shower experience with bath amenities by Juice Beauty. The products are as good for your body as they are for the planet and will leave you feeling refreshed with their invigorating green apple scent. Step out of the shower and into one of our amazingly soft Ameswell robes.

features.title: Refuel
features.text: Turn on the electric kettle and start your day with a smooth cup of coffee by local Santa Cruz roaster, Steeped. In-room bottled water is provided along with filtered water stations throughout the property to help you stay well-hydrated during your stay. Easy online ordering is available from our bar and restaurants to cure any craving from morning to night.

features.title: Retreat
features.text: Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, each guest room offers a retreat where you can get work done or watch your favorite show on a 65” Samsung Smart TV. A dedicated workspace, ultra-fast complimentary WiFi and abundance of charging ports keep you connected; a sitting area provides space to kick back with a book when you want to unplug.

features.title: Restore
features.text: At The Ameswell Hotel, we are committed to doing our part to protect and restore the environment. You will see evidence of this throughout your guest room - from the organic bath amenities to our commitment to zero single-use plastic. We have given special attention to each sustainability detail so that you can feel good about making a green travel decision.

offers.title: Fresh Start
offers.p1: Start your day off right with a daily $20 credit at The Flyby café. Serving delicious and healthy breakfasts featuring made-to-order meals, grab and go options and artisan coffee.

offers.title: Puppy Love
offers.p1: Treat your four-legged friend to an unforgettable stay at our pet-friendly property!  With a discounted pet fee of $50 (reg. $75), collapsible dog bowl, pet toy, and organic dog treat.

offers.title: Work from Ameswell
offers.p1: Work from one of our spacious, light filled guest rooms. This package includes: day use of a King Room, access to the pool, fitness center, library, and art gallery, two bottled waters, and one coffee, tea, or G.O.A.T Fuel energy drink.

offers.title: Wellness King
offers.p1: Make the most of our wellness offerings when you book a room in our Wellness Wing. This offer includes an in-room Mirror, adjustable weights, resistance bands and a yoga mat by Team Fitness, choice of G.O.A.T Fuel energy drink, and access to the fitness center, pool, and spa treatment rooms.

offers.title: Date Night
offers.p1: Enjoy a romantic getaway with a late check-out and daily $75 food and beverage credit to enjoy at Roger bar and Restaurant. Or make it a picnic on our expansive lawn with items from The Flyby.
